author: R. Prasad
title: Possible transmission of novel coronavirus from mother to child
description: Researchers found elevated levels of specific antibodies in a newborn
content: A possible case of transmission of novel coronavirus (SARS-CoV-2) from the mother to the child has been reported on March 26 in the Journal of the American Medical Association (JAMA). The researchers from the Renmin Hospital of Wuhan University and other hosp… [+2191 chars]
